SENT.plain: A significant number of children with the Beckwith-Wiedemann syndrome are prone to the development of nephroblastomas and adrenal carcinomas
Renomegaly, a prolonged tubular blush on excretory urography similar to that of medullary sponge kidney, and previously undescribed caliceal diverticula may be observed
Diligent followup is mandatory to detect early neoplasia
Suggestions are detailed based on reported case management
